items.question: Is the application completely free?
items.answer: Yes, Rafiq Al-Muslim app is completely free and contains no annoying ads that affect your spiritual experience.

items.question: How are prayer times calculated?
items.answer: The app relies on geographical location (GPS) to calculate prayer times with high accuracy according to the nearest approved calculation method in your area, with the possibility of manual adjustment.

items.question: Does the app work without internet?
items.answer: Yes, most of the app's features such as the Holy Quran, Adhkar, and prayer times work without the need for an internet connection. Only features requiring live updates like the radio and location update need a connection.

items.question: Does the app support night mode?
items.answer: Certainly! We provide a comfortable eye-friendly night mode for reading the Quran and Adhkar in low light.

items.question: How can I complete the Quran using the app?
items.answer: The app provides multiple completion plans; you can specify the duration you want to complete the Quran in, and the app will divide the daily Wird and remind you of it.
